name: Ayesha Rahman
persona: Ayesha is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.76. She is moderately conscientious and believes in her ability to succeed academically, though she sometimes struggles with maintaining consistent effort and managing test anxiety. Ayesha sets reasonable grade goals but knows she could push herself harder. Despite occasional setbacks, she shows perseverance and is determined to improve her academic standing before graduation.
